content.rendered:
Directed by Rohan Sippy

Written by Iti Agarwal. Bijesh Jayarajan

Cast Pankaj Tripathi( Madhav Mishra8 episodes, 2022 ). Swastika Mukherjee( Avantika Ahuja8 episodes, 2022 ). Purab Kohli( Neeraj Ahuja8 episodes, 2022 ). Aaditya Gupta( Mukul Ahuja8 episodes, 2022 ). Addinath Kothare( Insp. Prashant Waghmare8 episodes, 2022 ). Kalyanee Mulay( SI Gauri Karmakar8 episodes, 2022 ). Khushboo Atre( Ratna Mishra8 episodes, 2022 ). Saahitya Pansare( ASI Ravi Kumar8 episodes, 2022 ). Aatm Prakash Mishra( Deep – Madhav’s Assistant8 episodes, 2022 ). Shweta Basu Prasad( Adv. Lekha Piramal7 episodes, 2022 ). Gaurav Gera( Arvind7 episodes, 2022 ). Simmran Sharma( Nikita Jain – NGO Head7 episodes, 2022 ). Pradeep Jangid( SI Umesh Bhade7 episodes, 2022 ). Surbhi Mittal( Neetu – Lekha’s Assistant7 episodes, 2022 ). Deshna Dugad( Zara Ahuja6 episodes, 2022 ). Chandresh Singh( Mahendra – Estate Supervisor5 episodes, 2022 ). Upendra Limaye( Sandeep Shinde4 episodes, 2022 ). Rajesh Khera( Adv. Hemant Solkar4 episodes, 2022 ). Bishakha Thapa( Sonam Mathur – TV Journalist4 episodes, 2022 ). Arunim Mishra( Devesh – Party Attendee4 episodes, 2022 ). Arjun Jethwa( Somen – Party Attendee4 episodes, 2022 ). Vedant Sinha( Aamir – Juvenile Home Resident4 episodes, 2022 ). Suraj Rikame( Rocky – Juvenile Home Resident4 episodes, 2022 ). Shubham Chowdhury( Hari – Juvenile Home Resident4 episodes, 2022 ). Hemant Soni( Sampat – Juvenile Home Attendant4 episodes, 2022 ). Haresh Khatri( Sessions Court Judge4 episodes, 2022 ). Narendra Sachar( Dhiren Mittal – Estate Developer4 episodes, 2022 ). Manohar Teli( Policeman #14 episodes, 2022 ). Ganesh Ghadi( Policeman #24 episodes, 2022 ). Sharad Gurav( Policeman #34 episodes, 2022 ). Shubham Kumar( Juvenile Home Boy #14 episodes, 2022 ). Prince Gupta( Juvenile Home Boy #24 episodes, 2022 ). Deepak Patel( Juvenile Home Boy #34 episodes, 2022 ). Anurag Singh( Juvenile Home Boy #44 episodes, 2022 ). Naman Singh( Kid #14 episodes, 2022 ). Teerth Thakkar( Kid #24 episodes, 2022 ). Piyu Shah( Kid #34 episodes, 2022 ). Sushil Kumar( ASI Sachin3 episodes, 2022 ). Sara Gesawat( Nishi – Mukul’s Girlfriend3 episodes, 2022 ). Ishika Makhija( Ritika Kumar3 episodes, 2022 ). Sidharth Shah( Rahul – Party Attendee3 episodes, 2022 ). Avinash Kuri( Rakesh – News Anchor3 episodes, 2022 ). Swayam Joshi( Prasad – Juvenile Home Resident3 episodes, 2022 ). Raanu Singh( Moti – The Spot Boy3 episodes, 2022 ). Radhika Chavan( Mrs. Paranjape3 episodes, 2022 ). Sanjay Kota( Security Guard at Night Shift3 episodes, 2022 ). Nitesh Bhaluni( Party Attendee Male3 episodes, 2022 ). Seema Mishra( Mukul’s Mental-level Assessor2 episodes, 2022 ). Ishrat Khan( Saroj – Mahendra’s Wife2 episodes, 2022 ). Pari Bhatti( Ritu – Mahendra’s Daughter2 episodes, 2022 ). Rushad Rana( Vicky Kumar – Ritika’s Father2 episodes, 2022 ). Vaibhavi Mahajan( Pari – Party Attendee2 episodes, 2022 ). Palak Singh( Sania2 episodes, 2022 ). Jai Khadilkar( Pondy – Mukul’s Friend2 episodes, 2022 ). Aryan Gupta( Feroze – Mukul’s Friend2 episodes, 2022 ). Padmanabha Kotian( Dr. Varia2 episodes, 2022 ). Adityaraj( Sahir – Sania’s Brother2 episodes, 2022 ). Ajoy Chakraborty( Mr. Piramal – Lekha’s Father2 episodes, 2022 ). Chandrakant Taneja( Police Commissioner2 episodes, 2022 ). Aksh Shah( Varun Thakur – Mukul’s Schoolmate2 episodes, 2022 ). Tripti Sahu( Mini – Juvenile Home Nurse2 episodes, 2022 ). Shahrukh B. Sadri( Juvenile Court Magistrate2 episodes, 2022 ). Basant Kumar( Xavier – Drugs Supplier2 episodes, 2022 ). Puja Sawant( Mallika – Shoot Coordinator2 episodes, 2022 ). Sumanto Ray( Dr. Shantanu2 episodes, 2022 ). Muzammil S. Qureshi( Juvenile Home Teacher2 episodes, 2022 ). Deepra Mishra( Party Attendee Female2 episodes, 2022 ). Milind Joshi( Dada Jee – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Pankaj Gupta( Tau Jee – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Dimple Srivastava( Tai Jee – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Kuldeep Rawat( Chacha Jee – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Shipra Srivastava( Chachi Jee #2 – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Bharti Bhatti( Chachi Jee #1 – in the TV Show2 episodes, 2022 ). Manish Sisodia( Govind Bhatt – Material Expert1 episode, 2022 ). Suraj Singhan( Insp. Vitthal Amre1 episode, 2022 ). Prayrak Mehta( Monty – Juvenile Home Resident1 episode, 2022 ). Parimal Bhattacharya( Hospital Surgeon1 episode, 2022 ). Harsh Chatrath( Forensic Examiner1 episode, 2022 ). Nancy Gill( Naina – Vicky Kumar’s Wife1 episode, 2022 ). Kaveri Ghosh( Naina’s Friend1 episode, 2022 ). Abhay Kulkarni( Insp. Mihir Deshpande1 episode, 2022 ). Naeem Khan( Sub-inspector Mhatre1 episode, 2022 ). Karmmaan Rajaani( TV Anchor1 episode, 2022 ). Priyant( Security Guard at Party Venue1 episode, 2022 ). Kinzza Advani( Bittu – Zara’s Replacement in TV Show1 episode, 2022 ). Guru Haryani( Reporter #11 episode, 2022 ). Siddhant Ranjan Mishra( Reporter #21 episode, 2022 ). Anjaly Raz( Reporter #31 episode, 2022 ). Priyanka Jeena( Reporter #41 episode, 2022 ). Sulieman( Autorickshaw Driver1 episode, 2022 ). Samy( Film Crew Member #11 episode, 2022 ). Alex( Film Crew Member #21 episode, 2022 ). Shyam( Film Crew Member #31 episode, 2022 ). Jitendra Kumar( Vegetable Seller1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Varun Malik. Mahesh Menon. Shilpan Vyas Tinu

Production Applause Entertainment Ltd.. BBC Studios.

Certificate 16+

Official site Disney Hotstar

Season 1

Episodes 8
